metadata.name: The Unloved Player
metadata.description:
I will really need a miracle if I want to get out of this vicious circle. I keep on hurting everyone I touch, their hearts are so fragile they always get broken. Is it because I haven’t touched mine yet that I don’t know how to handle a heart properly ? I don’t know anything about love. I can’t be a player if I don’t know how to play. 


"The Unloved Player" 2022, Lana Denina

Part of The Soulmate Project.
